entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
